pronunciation: EXTOL' [Latin extollo; ex and tollo, to raise.]To

definition.text: raise in words or eulogy; to praise; to exalt in commendation; to magnify. We extol virtues, noble exploits, and heroism. Men are too much disposed to extol the rich and despise the poor.EXTOL him that rideth upon the heavens by his name Jah. Psalms 6 8:4.
